results.title: Nephrotic-range proteinuria in an infant with thin basement membrane nephropathy.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Hematuria_Benign_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562476 @@@Thin basement membrane nephropathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hematuria_Benign_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562476 @@@TBMN@@@) with heterozygous @GENE_COL4A3 @GENE_1285 @@@COL4A3@@@/@GENE_COL4A4 @GENE_1286 @@@COL4A4@@@ mutations is considered to be a cause of @<m>DISEASE_Hematuria_Benign_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562476 @@@benign familial hematuria@@@.
